text: Theodore "Ted" Strickland (born August 4, 1941) was the 68th Governor of Ohio. He held the office from 2007 to 2011. He is a member of the Democratic Party. Before he became Governor, he served in the United States House of Representatives for two terms (1993–1995 and 1997–2007). == References == Category:1941 births Category:Living people Category:20th-century American politicians Category:21st-century American politicians Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:Governors of Ohio Category:United States representatives from Ohio
title: Ted Strickland
